abstract: Contains information related to shader logging.
overview:
## Discussion

To enable shader logging, call [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/beginCommandBuffer(allocator:options:)] with an instance of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBufferOptions] that contains a non-`nil` [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLogState] instance in this property.

Shader functions log messages until the command buffer ends.

# logState

**Instance Property**

Contains information related to shader logging.

## Declaration

```swift
var logState: (any MTLLogState)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

To enable shader logging, call [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/beginCommandBuffer(allocator:options:)] with an instance of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBufferOptions] that contains a non-`nil` [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLogState] instance in this property.

Shader functions log messages until the command buffer ends.
title: logState
